name: Barbell Curl
description: Focuses on building overall biceps mass with a barbell.

name: Barbell Preacher Curl
description: Isolates the biceps for a more concentrated contraction on a preacher bench.

name: Bodyweight Curl
description: Targets the biceps using body weight as resistance.

name: Cable Curl With Bar
description: Provides constant tension to the biceps using a cable and bar.

name: Cable Curl With Rope
description: Engages the biceps with more flexibility and range of motion using a rope attachment.

name: Concentration Curl
description: Isolates each arm individually for maximum focus on the biceps.

name: Dumbbell Curl
description: A classic exercise for building biceps with dumbbells, offering a versatile range of motion.

name: Hammer Curl (Dumbbell)
description: Targets the biceps and brachialis with a neutral grip to add arm thickness.

name: Incline Dumbbell Curl
description: Stretches and isolates the biceps using an incline bench to enhance muscle activation.

name: Machine Bicep Curl
description: Offers controlled resistance targeting the biceps through a machine-based curl.

name: Plate Curl
description: Works the biceps by curling a weight plate for a unique grip challenge.

name: Zottman Curl
description: Combines a regular curl and reverse curl to target both the biceps and forearms.

name: Spider Curl (Barbell)
description: Performed on an incline bench to fully isolate the biceps using a barbell.

name: Spider Curl (Dumbbell)
description: Targets the biceps with an isolated movement on an incline bench using dumbbells.

name: EZ Bar Curl
description: Utilizes the EZ bar to reduce wrist strain while engaging the biceps.

name: Cross Body Hammer Curl
description: Targets the brachialis and biceps by curling the dumbbell across the body.

name: Hammer Curl (Band)
description: Engages the biceps and forearms using resistance bands in a hammer grip position.

name: Cable Curl
description: Provides continuous tension on the biceps throughout the entire range of motion.

name: Overhead Curl (Barbell)
description: Engages the biceps while lifting a barbell in an overhead curl motion.

name: Preacher Curl (Dumbbell)
description: Isolates the biceps with support from a preacher bench using dumbbells.

name: Reverse Curl (Barbell)
description: Strengthens both the biceps and forearms using an overhand grip with a barbell.

name: Reverse Curl (Dumbbell)
description: Targets the biceps and forearms with a focus on the brachioradialis.

name: Reverse Curl (Cable)
description: Engages the biceps and forearms with constant tension using a cable machine.

name: Preacher Curl (Machine)
description: Isolates the biceps with machine assistance for controlled movement.

name: Bicep Curl
description: A fundamental biceps exercise focused on building overall strength and mass.
